text: - My name is Serge Shevchenko.

I'm a Global Startup Partner
Development Manager at AWS.
I work within the Global Startup Program

which is formally launched
at re:invent 2019.
So I've been with AWS almost four years.
It's been quite the journey, honestly.

So when I came to AWS, I
actually started at the,
on the partner development rep team

and went through a promotion
and then joined the ISV team.
And I originally, when I joined AWS,
my intent was to go into sales
but I wanted to learn the technology

and the business from a
foundational perspective.
And it was quite interesting actually,
when I joined in a partner role
I found it so interesting to be working

with all these different
partners and businesses globally

that I kind of fell in love
with the role and the org.

The partner organization
really helps our customers

solve, essentially use
cases that AWS solutions
are the foundation of.
So they'll come in and whether they're in

the professional service
organization or ISV,
they'll solve use cases on top of AWS.
So, and oftentimes they'll work together,

essentially creating
best of class solutions
for shared customers.

And essentially oftentimes
they're actually catalyzing

cloud adoption through
either their platform,

their solution or sometimes
even their projects
if you're working with, let's say
a professional services company.
So it's, it's oftentimes I feel
like the partners that I work with
are just an extension of our business.
